column16: Uses allowed as a permitted or conditional use in the underlying zoning district require the approval of the Planning Commission in this overlay except agriculture/forestry and small accessory structures or additions to existing structures.
column18: The maximum density for this overlay is 1 lot per 25 acres with a minimum lot size of 5 acres. All proposals are reviewed by the Vermont Fish and Wildlife Department to ensure building does not impact the Deer Wintering Habitat or the Wildlife Travel Corridor.
